[set page_title]Launch[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] [set help_name]wizard.launch[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@

To launch your site, click launch. The following will occur:

  • All orders will be deleted from the order database (if selected.)
  • All customer records will be deleted from the user database (if selected.)
  • The order number will be reset.
  • The secure web server will be enabled. (If you don't accept credit cards, this is optional.)

[table-editor left_width=120 table_width=500 wizard=1 defaults=1 bottom_buttons=1 next_text=Launch no_top=1 no_bottom=1 row_template="[scratch row_template]" ui_profile="*launch" mv_nextpage="[either][cgi ui_nextpage][or]__UI_BASE__/wizard/do_launch[/either]" mv_prevpage="[either][cgi ui_prevpage][or]__UI_BASE__/wizard/step_preview[/either]" hidden.ui_return_to="__UI_BASE__/index" ui_wizard_fields="nukeorders nukeusers orderstart enablesecure" label.nukeorders="Delete sample order data" help.nukeorders="Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty order database" widget.nukeorders=yesno default.nukeorders=1 label.nukeusers="Delete sample user data" help.nukeusers="Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty customer database" widget.nukeusers=yesno default.nukeusers=1 label.orderstart="Starting order number" help.orderstart="First order number -- only letters/digits" widget.orderstart=text_8 filter.orderstart=alphanumeric default.orderstart=01000 label.enablesecure="Enable Secure (SSL)" help.enablesecure="Select Yes if your Stronghold secure server is set up" override.enablesecure=1 widget.enablesecure=select passed.enablesecure="0=No, 1=Yes" ] @_UI_STD_FOOTER_@
